title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง 81.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง 81.4 - Location

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
be made available at the main office of the department, which is located at One

Commerce Plaza, 99 Washington Avenue, Albany, NY 12231-0001. (b) Whenever practicable, records shall be
made available at a regional office most convenient to a data
subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง
81.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
